trans-unit.source: Provides access to an add-in for a variety of tasks.
trans-unit.target: Gir tilgang til et tillegg for en rekke oppgaver.

trans-unit.source: Use this class to perform the following tasks: - Use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A> property to obtain an <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object for an add-in.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne klassen til å utføre følgende oppgaver:-bruker <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A>til å hente et <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>objekt for tilleggsprogrammet.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AddInEnvironment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then use that object to activate other add-ins in the same application domain and process as the original add-in.
trans-unit.target: Deretter Bruk objektet for å aktivere andre tillegg i samme programdomenet og prosessen som opprinnelige tilleggsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AppDomain%2A> property to obtain an <xref:System.AppDomain> object for an add-in.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AppDomain%2A>til å hente et <xref:System.AppDomain>objekt for tilleggsprogrammet.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.AppDomain%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then use that object to activate other add-ins in the same application domain as the original add-in.
trans-unit.target: Deretter Bruk objektet for å aktivere andre tillegg i samme programdomenet som opprinnelige tilleggsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: Note that because of limitations in cross-process remoting, this scenario will not work with add-ins that are activated in a separate process.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at på grunn av begrensninger på tvers av prosesser ekstern kommunikasjon, dette scenarioet ikke fungerer med tillegg som er aktivert i en egen prosess.

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.Token%2A> property to obtain an <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken> object that represents an add-in.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.Token%2A>til å hente et <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken>objekt som representerer en tilleggsprogrammet.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.Token%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Shut down an add-in with the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.Shutdown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Avsluttes et tillegg med den <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.Shutdown%2A>metoden.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the controller for an add-in, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.GetAddInController%2A> method and pass an instance of the add-in as its parameter.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente kontroller for et tillegg ved kall av <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.GetAddInController%2A>metoden og pass en forekomst av tillegget som parameter.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInController.GetAddInController%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment> object for an add-in.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å hente <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>objektet for tilleggsprogrammet.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Then use that object to activate other add-ins in the same application domain and process as the original add-in.
trans-unit.target: Deretter Bruk objektet for å aktivere andre tillegg i samme programdomenet og prosessen som opprinnelige tilleggsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to activate other add-ins in the same environment as the original add-in.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som kan brukes til å aktivere andre tillegg i samme miljø som opprinnelige tilleggsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the application domain that contains an add-in.
trans-unit.target: Henter programdomenet som inneholder et tillegg.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to obtain an add-in's <xref:System.AppDomain> object and to activate other add-ins in the same application domain.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å hente en tillegget <xref:System.AppDomain>objekt og aktivere andre tillegg i samme programdomene.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: The application domain of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: Programdomenet av tilleggsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: Obtains the controller for an add-in.
trans-unit.target: Henter kontroller for et tillegg.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A> methods return an object that represents the host's view of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>Metoder returnere et objekt som representerer den verten visning av tilleggsprogrammet.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The host view of the add-in.
trans-unit.target: Vert-visningen av tilleggsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: The controller for the add-in.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller for tilleggsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: Disables an add-in.
trans-unit.target: Deaktiverer et tillegg.

trans-unit.source: This method breaks the communication pipeline between an add-in and its host.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bryter pipeline kommunikasjon mellom et tillegg og verten.

trans-unit.source: If the add-in was activated in an automatically generated application domain by using the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSecurityLevel%29> or <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.Security.PermissionSet%29> methods, the Shutdown method also unloads the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tillegget ble aktivert i en automatisk generert programdomenet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSecurityLevel%29>eller <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.Security.PermissionSet%29>metoder, metoden Shutdown laster også ut programdomenet.</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.Security.PermissionSet%29> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.Activate%60%601%28System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInSecurityLevel%29>

trans-unit.source: If the add-in was loaded into its own application domain, the Shutdown method also unloads the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tillegget ble lastet inn i sin egen programdomenet, lukker Shutdown-metoden også programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: If the add-in was loaded into an existing application domain, the host and pipeline segments will no longer have any references to that add-in.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tillegget ble lastet inn i en eksisterende programdomenet, har ikke lenger verts- og pipeline segmentene referanser til denne tilleggsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the add-in will be eligible to be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet blir tillegget berettiget til å være gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this class to shut down an add-in that is activated in an external process.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne klassen avsluttes et tillegg som er aktivert i en ekstern prosess.

trans-unit.source: Gets the token that represents the add-in.
trans-unit.target: Henter tokenet som representerer tilleggsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you use this property to obtain a token to activate an add-in at a later time.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen bruker vanligvis ikke hente token for å aktivere et tillegg senere.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the add-in.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer tilleggsprogrammet.
